NA	"Here's how the game works. You will always be presented with two outcome-time pairs. Imagine that you would receive an outcome after the indicated time interval. Your task is to indicate your preference for one of the options by clicking on the option. If for example you prefer 2$ today to 3$ in six weeks you would click on the field containing the 2$ today."	2	p	NA	NA	NA	NA	NA	NA	0	NA	500px	NA	NA	0
